pages.title: Manasmith
pages.text: This villager has dedicated his life to the research of the occult. He definitely $(l)CAN$() craft advanced stuff, but why $(l)SHOULD$() he sell it to you? Unless you are a Manasmith yourself, then he's definitely gonna. Research is not cheap.

pages.name: Manasmith
pages.text: An unemployed villager can become a Manasmith when standing near a Runic Artifact.
